features.title: A Powerful Toolkit for Your Data
features.subtitle: Explore, transform, and visualize your CSV data directly in your browser.

features.title: Data Processing
features.description: Load CSVs with auto-delimiter detection and smart chunking.

features.title: In-depth Analysis
features.description: Auto-identify column types and view column-based statistics.

features.title: Powerful Transformation
features.description: Over 30 column operations with full undo/redo history.

features.title: Interactive Data Grid
features.description: Sort, filter, and navigate your data with ease.

features.title: Dynamic Visualizations
features.description: Create histograms, line charts, scatter plots, and more.

features.title: Flexible Exporting
features.description: Export your data to CSV, JSON, or Excel-compatible formats.

features.title: Modern Tech Stack
features.description: Built with React 18, TypeScript, and Vite for a fast experience.

features.title: Intuitive Interface
features.description: Keyboard shortcuts, context menus, and a minimal design.

features.title: Privacy by Design
features.description: Your data is processed locally and never uploaded to a server.

privacy.title: 100% Local & Private
privacy.description: Moonizer runs entirely in your web browser. Your data is never uploaded to a server, ensuring complete privacy and security. It's your data, on your machine, always.
